mapper.insert: insert into hm_member(email, nick, pw) values(#{email}, #{nick}, #{pw})
mapper.select: select mem.mno, mem.email, nick, pw, point, authority from hm_member mem left outer join hm_member_auth auth on mem.email = auth.email where mem.email = #{email}
select writer as nick, sum(blike + rcount) as score, count(mno) as posting from hm_board group by writer order by score desc limit 10
select nick, point from hm_member order by point desc limit 10
select nick from hm_member where email=#{email}
select email from hm_member where nick=#{nick}
mapper.update: update hm_member set point=#{point} where mno=#{mno}
